test_case_schema.Name: string - Test case name (required)
test_case_schema.Status: string - Draft | Approved | In Review | etc.
test_case_schema.Objective: string - Goal and purpose of the test case
test_case_schema.Steps: array - [step1, step2, step3, ...] (must have same length as Expected and Data)
test_case_schema.Data: array - [data_for_step1, data_for_step2, ...] (aligns with Steps by index; must have same length as Steps; entries may be empty)
test_case_schema.Expected: array - [expected_result1, expected_result2, expected_result3, ...] (must have same length as Steps and Data)

example_structure.Name: Example Test Case
example_structure.Precondition: System is in initial state and all prerequisites are met
example_structure.Objective: Validate that the feature works as expected
Data: Sample payload or parameters for Step 1
Sample ID or environment flag for Step 3
Expected: Expected result 1: Initial action completed successfully
Expected result 2: Main functionality works correctly
Expected result 3: Final state is as expected
